name: Seasons Greetings
description: Second group project during bootcamp that helped the user find ingredients that are in season and meals that they can make with said ingredients

name: Worth A Shot
description: First group project in bootcamp that helped find a mixed drink when given an alcohol and mixer

name: Note Taker
description: A simple application that let a user record and save notes; our task for this assigement was to create and operate the API

name: Workout Tracker
description: An application that tracked a users workouts stats and exercise; our assignment was to set up the DB with mongoose

name: Tech Blog
description: A blog that a user can log in, create posts, and explore/comment on other users posts; coded from scratch

name: Team Profile Generator
description: A simple application to create a list of team members for a Tech Co.; this helped us learn how to set up dynamic websites based on user filled prompts
